name: Nyctophobia Bloodline
description:
Nyctophobia Bloodline is a sequel for our first game Nyctophobia Devil Unleashed. This is a Singleplayer Psychological FirstPerson Horror game developed by Solitary Games (Keneth Agar) A Filipino Horror Game Developer and Published by Lamina Studios.

NOTE: This game is on Early Stage (DEMO) so expect a lot of bugs and glitches throughout the game. Thankyou!

STORY :  Athan, a 25 years old man who in search of his long lost relative named Angelica. His sudden interest in finding her started when unfortunate events happened in his life. His father died of cancer, he lost his job, he lost his properties, and lastly his wife eventually divorced him. He lost everything and he had no one. However, he knew that he has one more relative remaining and he also knew that their ancestors owned a big land property, where an abandoned hospital was built. He believed that Angelica grew up near the property, but his late father told him to never bother finding it. Athan becomes desperate in finding the property so he can get the land title. Just like what his ancestors' tragic fate, he will do whatever he could so he can have it for his own.

DEMO FEATURES

  • Battery System: Yes your battery will drain so you need to find batteries throughout the game.
  • Voice Recognition: This game can hear your voice through your microphone. So you can use your microphone to talk to the ghosts.
  • Controller Support (XBOX/PS4)

(Some Phrases you can use)

  1.  Where are you?
  2.  How did you die?
  3.  How old are you?
  4.  Are you here?
  5.  I am not afraid!
  6.  What's your name?
  7.  Give us a sign
  8.  Who are you?
  9.  Show yourself!
  10.  ETC
